channel.title: Deborah on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Deborah on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Careers in Care: Adult social care
item.description: MD - Michelle Drumm S - Sarah G - Gillian D - Deborah On the 16th of September 2019, Iriss attended the launch of the SSSC’s Careers and Care Website which was created to highlight the wide variety of career opportunities available in the sector. The resource demonstrates how people can build a career working with children and young people in social services and health care settings or as a social worker.

item.title: Secure care in Scotland
item.description: DN - Debbie Nolan AG - Alison Gough S - Sharon D - Deborah L - Lesley DN Thanks a lot to everyone for joining us today. Today we’re going to be talking about the perceptions and experiences of secure care with myself. My name is Debbie Nolan, I’m Practice Development Advisor at the Centre for Youth & Criminal Justice. AG Alison Gough, I’m the Secure Care National Advisor and I’m also based at CYCJ.
